list_definition.definition: to (cause to) go round and round rapidly

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spun the revolving door round and round.

list_definition.definition: to form threads from (wool, cotton etc) by drawing out and twisting

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The old woman was spinning (wool) in the corner of the room.
